Uses of Interface
gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity.Transitivity.SuccessorsListener

Packages that use Transitivity.SuccessorsListener
gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity Object-oriented transitive closure and reduction algorithms. 
 

Uses of Transitivity.SuccessorsListener in gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity
 

Methods in gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity with parameters of type Transitivity.SuccessorsListener
static void Transitivity.acyclicClosureSweep(InspectableGraph g, SuccessorSetFactory successorSetFactory, Transitivity.SuccessorsListener listener)
          Sweeps the graph in reverse-topological order (i.e. starting with nodes with zero out-degree, and ending at nodes with zero in-degree), creates on-the-fly the successor set for each node, notifies the provided Transitivity.SuccessorsListener to do arbitrary processing when the complete successor set is available for each node, and then discards the successor sets when they are no longer needed.
